mdRecord.dcterms:description: Appointment, 30 April 1780, of Melchizedeck Spragins as deputy surveyor of Pittsylvania County, Va., signed by Thomas Jefferson, governor. From Mss. Sm Coll Jefferson, Thomas Jefferson Correspondence, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: College of William and Mary, Earl Gregg Swem Library.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Melchizedeck Spragins Appointment, 30 April 1780
